bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum low center of gravity SX FSR frame, ORE TT/DT, forged HT, pierced seat tube, full cartridge bearing, ISCG mount, 4.2" travel, adjustable slalom geometry, replaceable derailleur hanger with rear derailleur guard

components.description: Fox RP3, rebound and pro pedal adjustment, tuned for slalom racing
7050 hard annodized alloy collar with QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
